bifurcation.name: Bifurcated Normalization
bifurcation.logic: Interest rate cuts are not lifting all assets. Capital is concentrating in 'Infrastructure Realizers' (AI CapEx recipients) while legacy sectors face deflationary pressure.

capex_supercycle.name: CapEx Supercycle
capex_supercycle.logic: Physical infrastructure build-out (power, cooling, silicon) creates a valuation floor for key enablers like Oracle and Nvidia.

ORCL.rationale: Undervalued conversion of $98B backlog to recognized revenue. TikTok monetization optionality not priced in.
consensus_log: Agent[Macro]: Rate sensitive but high cash flow (Signal: ACCUMULATE)

AMZN.rationale: AWS margin expansion driven by Sovereign AI adoption. Retail efficiency hitting peak optimization.
consensus_log: Agent[Cloud]: AWS margins expanding to 34% (Signal: BUY)

NVDA.rationale: Blackwell/Rubin architecture transition ensures pricing power through 2027.
consensus_log: Agent[SupplyChain]: CoWoS capacity fully booked (Signal: STRONG BUY)
Agent[Valuation]: Forward PE 28x is reasonable (Signal: HOLD)
